bibl.title: Letter William Crawford Gorgas to Howard A. Kelly, December 24, 1907

div1.p: Gorgas writes to Kelly that Ross, not Guiteras, was the director of Las Animas Hospital.

div1.head: Letter William Crawford Gorgas to Howard A. Kelly, December 24, 1907
div1.opener:
Referring to your File No.____
ISTHMIAN CANAL COMMISSION
DEPARTMENT OF SANITATION
ANCON, CANAL ZONE
Ahcon, C.Z., December 24, 1907.
COL. W. C. GORGAS, U. S. A.,
CHIEF SANITARY OFFICER.
In replying refer to File No..........................
ackn.
Dr. Howard A. Kelly,
1418 Eutaw Place,
Baltimore, Md.
Dear Doctor Kelly:
div1.p:
Dr. Ross writes me calling my attention
to the fact that I stated that Dr. Guiteras was in charge
of the hospital at the time referred to. In this I am
in error. Dr. Ross was the Director of the hospital at
the time.
div1.closer: Yours very truly, W.C. Gorgas W.
